landing.subtitle: I'm Carlos Ojeda, a Machine Learning Engineer
landing.description: Passionate about understanding the world and solving complex challenges through the power of Human, Machine & Deep Learning

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: My journey in technology and science

personalMessage.title: Growing up in the wide-open landscapes of Baja California taught me to honor nature, humanity, and science. This formative setting fostered a curiosity that now drives my exploration of disciplines ranging from nanotechnology to astronomy, biology, and anthropology ~ always through the lens of mathematics and data analysis.
personalMessage.subtitle: My aim is to derive insights that enable the prudent optimization of resources and processes wherever possible.

employment.title: Turning ideas into impact üíº
employment.description: I've contributed to large-scale technology projects, building AI-powered and web solutions that deliver measurable results and lasting value.

positions.title: Software Engineer
description: Increased backend test coverage from ~60% to ~80%, launched PSR test workflows, authored onboarding documentation, and created pytest suites for new ML explainability features.
Reduced page load times by ~35% through bundle profiling, code splitting, and close coordination with cross-functional teams (Data Science, UI, Infrastructure).

positions.title: Machine Learning Associate
description: Developed and deployed classification and prediction services on GCP and Azure ML using TensorFlow Serving and LIME for model interpretability.

positions.title: Front-End Developer
description: Built and deployed modern UI components for Home Depot's e-commerce platform using React, Ant Design, and GCP. Enhanced CI/CD pipelines through GitHub Actions.

positions.title: Junior Back-End Developer
description: Developed back-end authentication endpoints and database models using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Created test plans aligned with ISO/IEC/IEEE 29119 standards and deployed the application on AWS, supporting over 200k IMSS users.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: My work in technology and innovation

peripheralLoans.title: Peripheral Loans
peripheralLoans.description: Platform that manages device loans within IBM's Guadalajara.
peripheralLoans.detailedDescription: Engineered a Management System to facilitate device lending to IBM's Guadalajara employees during the Covid era. Orchestrated the design and development of the User Interface as the Front-End specialist. Used Containers to deploy a scalable Back-End supporting more than 2,000 device records. Rigorously tested functionalities using Unitary Tests, Postman and Cypress, ensuring seamless alignment with user requirements.

urbanMobility.title: Urban Mobility Simulation
urbanMobility.description: Approach to solve Mexico's urban mobility problem by reducing vehicular congestion.
urbanMobility.detailedDescription: Developed an agent-based simulation platform to analyze and reduce vehicular congestion in Mexican cities. Built a real-time visualization environment in Unity (C#) to display traffic flows and live KPIs. Implemented the simulation engine in Python with AgentPy to model heterogeneous agents and test policies such as adaptive traffic signals and dedicated lanes. Deployed a Flask API on IBM Cloud to orchestrate simulations, stream results via REST/WebSockets, and enable interactive scenario configuration from the Unity interface.

foodBank.title: FoodBank
foodBank.description: Android app to donate money and food in Jalisco, Mexico.
foodBank.detailedDescription: Donation system to raise money and food for more than 30,000 families in Jalisco, Mexico. Created an Android app using Kotlin with a feature to donate food either by delivery or in person to the Food Bank Center. Used Firebase DB to track donations and manage thousands of records.

hiredocs.title: Hiredocs
hiredocs.description: Web App to track the Hiring Process in the Talent Acquisition Team at Amdocs.
hiredocs.detailedDescription: Contributed to the creation of a Tracking System for the Hiring Process at Amdocs. Connecting teams across global locations and as a key member of the Scrum Development Team, I played a role in designing and implementing the Front-End, while also integrating Back-End features to ensure robust Data Protection. Additionally, presented the system to Amdocs executives in Guadalajara, showcasing its capabilities and functionalities.

endlessRunner.title: Endless Runner
endlessRunner.description: A platformer game with an endless runner and collectible objects.

maraca.title: Caraca sanitizer
maraca.description: IoT device to manage the number of people inside a building due to Covid-19.

lexicalAnalyzer.title: Parallel Lexical Analyzer
lexicalAnalyzer.description: State Machine to highlight reserved words in .txt files.

streamStagePrediction.title: Stream Stage Prediction with ML
streamStagePrediction.description: Built ML models to predict river stage and discharge from daylight images, in collaboration with the University of Nebraska ‚Äì Lincoln research team.
streamStagePrediction.detailedDescription: Collaborated with University of Nebraska ‚Äì Lincoln to develop Machine and Deep Learning models for predicting stream stage and discharge from the North Platte River, State Line Weir using daylight images taken at one hour intervals from 2012 to 2019. Loss metrics were considered, selected and used to evaluate different models trained with the 40,000+ river images and features extracted in Python (EfficientNetB0, ResNet101, MLP, SVR and RFR).
